description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. Give all allies +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy. Give all allies +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: "Any fool can throw overwhelming force at the enemy. It takes vision to conceal that force until the decisive moment." - Jericho Swain
name: Decisive Maneuver
